Title: Relates to the mandatory reporting of senior abuse or maltreatment
Summary: Identifies persons to be mandatory reporters of senior abuse or maltreatment; describes the procedures and steps to be taken to report senior abuse to adult protective services.
LawCode: Add Art 9-B Title 4 ยง473-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to mandatory reporting of senior abuse or maltreatment
